column3: News;Kampot------: A German was found dead in a rented room 15th of November
column4: 2018. The body was found in Kampot city after police received a report from the landlord.  The victim has been named as Robert Peter  Mikulski
column5: a 42-year-old German national.------The authorities immediately conducted a preliminary examination of the bodies. They concluded that the victim suffered a physical illness had used marijuana and sleeping tablets.------The authorities are in the process of handing over to the embassy in Cambodia.------Warning
